description: Accept bitcoin payments for your business without any risk of volatility, fraud or any sort of charge-back's using bitpaid. With BitPaid you can convert your local currency into bitcoin or the other way around. We deposit your funds into your bank account each business day with a guaranteed exchange rate. Manage all your bitcoin finances in one app with the secured and open source wallet. Receive settlement for bitcoin payments directly to your bank account in your own currency.
name: Bitpaid
